effect.shortEffect: This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2×.
effect.full: When this Pokémon uses a Normal moves, that move is Electric its power is 1.2×.

description.sun-moon: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
description.sword-shield: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
